statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE last_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchase_histories WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, address FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_histories GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT cp.customer_id, cp.name, ph.purchase_date FROM customer_profiles cp INNER JOIN purchase_histories ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id WHERE ph.amount > 50 ORDER BY ph.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT cp.name, ph.amount FROM customer_profiles cp LEFT JOIN purchase_histories ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id WHERE ph.amount IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM PurchaseHistories WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE customer_id = 2 AND recommended_product_id = 5;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age < 25;
SELECT customer_name, location, age FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' AND age < 40;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistories WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, recommended_product_id FROM CustomerProfiles JOIN ProductRecommendations ON CustomerProfiles.customer_id = ProductRecommendations.customer_id WHERE recommendation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id, product_id;

SELECT cp.first_name, p.product_name, r.recommendation_score FROM customer_profiles cp JOIN recommendations r ON cp.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE cp.customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, recommended_product_id, score FROM recommendations ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM reviews GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;

SELECT reviews.review_id, reviews.review_text, reviews.rating, customers.first_name, products.product_name FROM reviews JOIN customers ON reviews.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON reviews.product_id = products.product_id;
